channel.description: Recent content in Posts on No Silver Bullet

item.title: Little Hack for fun (and not too much profit)
item.description: 1. Intro Hi there, this is my first blog post and i’m very excited to have you here. First things first, why i decide this especially the following theme to be my first blog post? Well, everyone needs to start from somewhere, and wait for the perfect, HackerNews trending, topic come out of the blue is not my style. :) Nevertheless, the actual story. There i was in a boring Computer Architecture II and a friend was playing gamedle.
